content: **peppermint houndstooth scarf pattern by crochet for you** this scarf looks fun and cheerful all together houndstooth stitch and peppermint color and especially with the pom pom **skill level ** easy **finished size ** 7 width and 34 long with the pom-pom **materials ** #4 medium / worsted weight yarns approx 420 yards total i used c1 red color approx 210 yards total c2 white color approx 210 yards total j-10 6mm crochet hook tapestry needle for weaving ends 2 pom-pom
